newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Commerce's Daley hails Q4 GDP advance.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Commerce's Daley hails Q4 GDP advance.

text.p: Commerce Secretary William Daley Friday hailed the rise in fourth quarter Gross Domestic Product saying it has occurred without troublesome inflation.
"It's hard to imagine an improvement on the results we have reported today," he said in a statement. "Growth is up but inflation is not."
The department reported earlier that GDP jumped 4.7 percent in the fourth quarter. Daley issued his statement on the first day of his new job as secretary.
